snippet: SEGAL--Robert. Congregation Rodeph Sholom mourns the death of our long time and devoted member, Robert Segal, beloved husband of Wendy Segal. Our heartfelt condolences to Wendy, their daughter Daniella, and all their dear ones. Robert N. Levine, D.D., Senior Rabbi Martin Flumenbaum, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: SEGAL--Robert. Congregation Rodeph Sholom mourns the death of our long time and devoted member, Robert Segal, beloved husband of Wendy Segal. Our heartfelt condolences to Wendy, their daughter Daniella, and all their dear ones. Robert N. Levine, D.D., Senior Rabbi Martin Flumenbaum, President 1/3
